title: Behavior Modification Practice: CAPSI-Based Verbal Communication Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic language communication skills
context.additional_context: Designed for learners requiring behavior modification techniques in language domains through administrator/leader role-taking. A course deliverable exclusively via smartphones in PC-unavailable environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze language behavior modification cases with over 85% accuracy via the CAPSI system.
Learners can achieve over 90% accuracy in peer assessment of practical assignments by acting as peer proctors.
Learners can apply at least three language behavior modification strategies to real-world cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
